product_name: Big Agnes Fly Creek UL 2 Footprint
long_description: Use this coated nylon taffeta footprint underneath your Big Agnes Fly Creek UL 2 tent to protect its floor from wear and abrasion. Sized to fit so that it prevents pooling of water under tent during wet weather.
short_description: Use this coated nylon taffeta footprint underneath your Big Agnes Fly Creek UL 2 tent to protect its floor from wear and abrasion.
